casebody.data:
PONTCHARTRAIN NATURAL GAS SYSTEM, k/d/s Promix, L.L.C., and Acadian Gas Pipeline System
v.
TEXAS BRINE COMPANY, LLC NO. 2019-CC-0529 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 3, 2019 Not considered. See La.S.Ct.R. IX, § 6. HUGHES, J., would grant reconsideration.

CRICHTON, J., would grant reconsideration.

GENOVESE, J., would grant reconsideration.
